original: ALRUTZ, Otto Reinhold, Advokat, Stockholm, f Sthlm 2/5 72 av byggn.ch A O A o Anna Benckert, gm Malla Jansson. Studex NLatin 90, jur utr kand Upps 97, tingstjg Mellansysslets doms 98—00, tjg i domst o äm-betsv. Anst å G Abenius, adv.byrå 01—09, eg adv.byrå sed. 09; sekr h Nya Trollh kanalbol 01—05, h Sthlm byggm.frn 02—08, ombudsm Sthlm-Nynäs jvg 03—06, aman h Sthlms städs ombudsm 03—06, ombudsm Sthlms stads brandförsäkr.kont 06—37, sekr o ombudsm Dalälvens regl.frn o vattenregl.föret 16—42, jur o styr.led Indalsälvens regl.frn o vattenregl.föret fr bild 20 resp 36 t 42 samt h Sv vattenkraftfrn. Ag villafastgh i Djursh. Resor: Skand länd, Tyskl, Engl, Holl, Belg. Frankr, Ital. Av trycket: Upps i vattenrättsl f rå g. KVO2kl, RNO, Sthlms stads brandför-säkr.kont:s st o mindre GM; led Sv adv.samf, Juristfrn, Sällsk Idun, SHT.
translated: ALRUTZ, Otto Reinhold, Lawyer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on May 2nd, 1872, son of building contractor A.O.A and Anna Benckert, married Malla Jansson. Graduated from Latin School in 1890, completed law studies at Uppsala University in 1897. Served as a court clerk in the Mellansysslet District Court from 1898 to 1900, worked in various court and government positions. Employed at G. Abenius law firm from 1901 to 1909, established own law firm in 1909. Secretary at Nya Trollh Canal Company from 1901 to 1905, Stockholm Construction Company from 1902 to 1908, representative for Stockholm-Nynäs Railway from 1903 to 1906, assistant to the Stockholm City Cleaning Authority from 1903 to 1906, representative for Stockholm City Fire Insurance Company from 1906 to 1937, secretary and representative for Dalälven Regulation Company and Water Regulation Association from 1916 to 1942, legal advisor and board member for Indalsälven Regulation Company and Water Regulation Association since establishment in 1920 and 1936 respectively, and member of the Swedish Hydroelectric Power Company. Owned villa property in Djursholm. Traveled to Scandinavian countries, Germany, England, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, and Italy. Published work on water rights in Uppsala. Holder of the Royal Order of Vasa, Knight 2nd Class, the Royal Norwegian Order, and recognized for service at Stockholm City Fire Insurance Company. Member of the Swedish Bar Association, Juridical Society, Society Idun, and the Swedish Historical Society.
